description: Try as he might, Rocco can't keep determined young men from their intentions, so when James Huntsman and Markie More insisted on teaming up for another scene, Rocco's hands were pretty much tied. Luckily, the chemistry between James and Markie is worth a second look, so when Rocco catches them messing around with each other in the bedroom, he decides to just let the cameras roll and see what plays out. True to their words, Markie and James deliver a hot rendezvous, as Markie deep throats James before letting him have his way with Markie's sweet hole any and every way he desires. James pounds Markie from behind before letting him take control in reverse cowboy. Markie bounces on James meat stick like he misses it, and James is rock hard and ready to burst, flipping Markie around and banging him out missionary. Markie spits his load as James keeps pounding, pulling out to blast Markie with a re-load years in the making. Hopefully it won't be so long before they do it one more time.
title: Back in the Hunt
